trends: There have been no other sightings in Spiro
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my wife stepped outside to smoke. She pointed behind me and said look there was a very bright orange light toward some tree's near our house. It slowly moved remaining very bright toward the north roughly for 15 seconds then faded out. I kept looking due east and it reappeared just above tree level and begin descending down and was so bright it even lit up the trees and did this for another 15 seconds and then i lost sight of it as it faded out again. Ive seen other unexplained lights here several times a night it does not have the appearance of any planes,helicopter etc.
